document.full_text: at 77, bill white, the former player, broadcaster and national league president, recalls traveling in the jim crow south, friendship with phil rizzuto and conflict with fay vincent.
document.title: bill white, away from the rat race, is writing bluntly about it
lines_and_colors: at 77, bill white, the former player, broadcaster and national league president, recalls traveling in the jim crow south, friendship with phil rizzuto and conflict with fay vincent.
